attributes.action: Hold a referendum on independence for Greater London
attributes.additional_details: In the recent UK referendum on membership of the EU, 60% of those who voted in London voted to remain. London is an international city, and makes it's living trading with Europe and the world.  Our dreams and aspirations are different from the rest of England.  As an independent city state with membership of the EU, we could retain our international status and prosperity, and liberal outlook.
attributes.background: London is different from the rest of the UK, with different values and aspirations.  Taxes raised in London go to regions who want a completely different future from us.  We should take control of our own destiny.
